name: Characterizes Coherence Measures
description: Describes the different mathematical formulations of coherence that generate distinct classes of coherence-preserving dynamics.
subject: urn:uor:resource:coherence-preserving-dynamics
contextualDescription: The Coherence-Preserving Dynamics resource characterizes different types of coherence measures, including information-theoretic, structural, functional, and relational coherence, each generating distinct classes of coherence-preserving dynamics that maintain different aspects of system identity.
